content: To be able to reassign data, delete one user at a time.

comment.text: This translation key is used for the "ToBeAbleToReassignData" message, which is displayed in a delete profile dialog to inform users about the process of reassigning data when deleting their account. The text encourages users to delete one user at a time for reassignment purposes. It appears on the body component in the /packages/client/src/components/dialogs/DeleteProfileEverDialog component.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'Məlumatı yenidən təyin etmək üçün bir istifadəçini silin' doesn't fully capture the meaning of 'To be able to reassign data, delete one user at a time.' It translates 'reassign' as 'yenidən təyin etmək,' which is technically correct, but 'reassign' implies a more complex action. A more natural phrasing would emphasize the process.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Məlumatı digər istifadəçiyə yükləmək üçün, bir istifadəçini vaxtaşırı silin.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'Abyste mohli data znovu přiřadit, odstraňte vždy jednoho uživatele.' is slightly awkward. A more natural phrasing might be 'Pro opětovné přiřazení dat odstraňte vždy jednoho uživatele.' or 'Data lze znovu přiřadit pouze odstraňováním jednoho uživatele po druhém.'
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Pro opětovné přiřazení dat odstraňte vždy jednoho uživatele.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The English phrase 'To be able to reassign data' is not perfectly captured by 'Um Daten neu zuweisen zu können'. A more accurate translation would emphasize the necessity of the deletion action for the reassigning to be possible. The current phrasing is a bit convoluted.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Um Daten neu zuweisen zu können, muss zuerst ein Benutzer gelöscht werden.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While grammatically correct, 'löschen Sie jeweils einen Benutzer' sounds a little formal and somewhat robotic for a user-facing message. The directness might be off-putting.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: löschen Sie bitte zuerst einen Benutzer.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Armenian translation "Որպեսզի կարողանաք վերանշանակել տվյալները, ջնջեք մեկ օգտատեր:" doesn't perfectly convey the nuance of 'To be able to reassign data'. A more accurate translation might emphasize the *requirement* to delete one user at a time. 'Որպեսզի հնարավոր լինի վերանշանակել տվյալները, ջնջեք մեկ օգտատեր առանձին:" would be closer.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Որպեսզի հնարավոր լինի վերանշանակել տվյալները, ջնջեք մեկ օգտատեր առանձին:

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'データを再割り当てするためには、一度に一人のユーザーを削除してください。' is technically correct but sounds very formal and a bit awkward.  A more natural phrasing would be better. The original emphasizes *being able* to reassign data as a consequence of deleting users.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: データを再割り当てするには、一度に一人のユーザーを削除する必要があります。 (Data re-assignment requires deleting one user at a time.) or データを再割り当てするには、一度に1ユーザーずつ削除してください。(To reassign data, please delete one user at a time.)

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'ຄືນໃໝ່' in 'ມອບໝາຍຂໍ້ມູນຄືນໃໝ່' could be confusing. It literally translates to 'new return' and might not be the best way to convey 'reassign'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider using a more direct translation for 'reassign', such as 'ແບ່ງປັນຄືນ' or 'ມອບໃຫມ່' depending on the specific nuance intended.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation "Lai varētu atkārtoti piešķirt datus, vienlaikus izdzēsiet vienu lietotāju." implies deleting multiple users simultaneously, contradicting the English text which specifies deleting one user at a time. 'Vienlaikus' (simultaneously) is the problematic word.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Lai varētu atkārtoti piešķirt datus, izdzēsiet vienu lietotāju pēc kārtas.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'reafectaa' is not the most natural or accurate translation of 'reassign' in this context. 'Reatribui' would be a more common and understandable term.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Pentru a putea reatribui datele, ștergeți utilizatorii unul câte unul.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'වරකට' (warakata) is acceptable but could be replaced with 'එක්වර' (ekwara) for a more natural flow.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: එක්වර එක් පරිශ්‍රීලකයෙක් බැගින් මැකීමෙන් දත්ත යළි පැවරීමට හැකි වේ.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While not strictly incorrect, the sentence structure could be improved for better readability. The phrase 'බැගින් මැකීමෙන්' could be rephrased.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: එක්වර එක් පරිශ්‍රීලකයෙක් මැකීමෙන් දත්ත යළි පැවරීමට හැකි වේ.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'Да бисте могли поново да доделите податке' could be improved. 'Поново доделите' implies re-assigning which isn't necessarily the original intent. A more accurate translation would focus on simply assigning the data.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Да бисте могли да доделите податке...

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While technically correct, 'једног по једног корисника' is slightly verbose. While understandable, a more concise phrasing would be preferred in UI text.

The translation 'Da biste mogli ponovo da dodelite podatke' is not the most natural way to express 'To be able to reassign data'.  'Ponovo' implies re-adding, not reassigning. A more accurate phrasing would focus on the re-assignment aspect.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Da biste mogli da preuredite podatke, brišite jednog po jednog korisnika.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation "Verileri yeniden atayabilmek için her seferinde sadece bir kullanıcıyı silin." is a literal translation but sounds awkward in Turkish. A more natural phrasing would focus on the restriction of deleting one user at a time.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Verileri yeniden atayabilmek için, lütfen her seferinde yalnızca bir kullanıcı silin.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The sentence is a little long and could be slightly improved for readability.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Verileri yeniden atayabilmek için, tek tek kullanıcı silimi yapmanız gerekmektedir.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'Để có thể chuyển giao lại dữ liệu, hãy xóa từng người dùng một' isn't the most natural or concise way to convey the meaning. 'Chuyển giao lại dữ liệu' can be perceived as overly formal and 'xóa từng người dùng một' is slightly awkward. A more natural phrasing would focus on the ability to transfer, not the individual deletion process.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Để có thể chuyển giao dữ liệu, hãy xóa từng người dùng.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While technically correct, the repeated 'dữ liệu' (data) sounds a bit repetitive. It's more common to avoid repetition in Vietnamese.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Để có thể chuyển giao dữ liệu, hãy xóa từng người dùng.
